explanation: The bug was in the line used to check the diagonal from right to left (右上斜め). Specifically, the calculation of the indices was incorrect when accessing the characters of the strings for the top-right diagonal. In the original line, it incorrectly subtracted 'k' from 'i' which leads to accessing an invalid row. The corrected version simply needs to ensure that the row index is adjusted correctly without going out of bounds. I changed 'i-k+1' to 'i-k' to correctly access the row during the printing process.
